text: Death of Saint Anthony the Abbott, Santa Maria Assunta a Casole d'Elsa Giovanni Paolo Pisani (1574-1637) was an Italian painter, active mainly in a Mannerist style in Siena.Lombardia Beni Culturali.Checklist of Painters from 1200-1994, edited by Witt Library of the Courtauld Institute, page 404. Paintings can be found in the churches of San Sebastiano in Vallepiatta and Santo Spirito. ==References== Category:1574 births Category:1637 deaths Category:Mannerist painters Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Sienese painters
title: Giovanni Paolo Pisani
